movie.title: Into the Woods
movie.writer: James Lapine (screenplay), James Lapine (musical), Stephen Sondheim (musical)
movie.actors: Anna Kendrick, Daniel Huttlestone, James Corden, Emily Blunt
movie.plot: Into the Woods is a modern twist on the beloved Brothers Grimm fairy tales in a musical format that follows the classic tales of Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, Jack and the Beanstalk, and Rapunzel-all tied together by an original story involving a baker and his wife, their wish to begin a family and their interaction with the witch who has put a curse on them.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 9 wins & 52 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: On the whole, this Disney adaptation of the Sondheim classic sits comfortably at the corner of Hollywood and Broadway -- even if it darkens to its detriment in the final act.
